display_long_description:
-- Timo Boll VR Table Tennis: Play with A Legend --

Don’t expect a table tennis simulation; it’s the Need for Speed™ of table tennis games!

Step into the family-friendly world of Timo Boll VR Table Tennis, where reality meets virtual excitement.

Play with the legendary table tennis icon, Timo Boll and beam Timo right into your living room or your training center with our mixed reality mode.

Challenge photorealistic AI opponents including a robot. 

You can also step in for a training session with Timo "Magic" Boll in this ultra-realistic looking VR experience. 

Whether you’re in for casual fun or aiming to learn from the legend, Timo Boll VR Table Tennis has something for everyone. 


** Casual Fun **
If you’re in for the fun, go for some free hitting with the legend himself. Auto-assistance will support your game and Timo will adapt to your skills. 

** Campaign Mode **
Experience the excitement of arcade table tennis with lifelike AI opponents and a robot in the campaign mode.

** Train With A Legend ** 
Want to learn from the legend? Timo Boll VR Table Tennis offers new immersive training opportunities. Analyze Timo’s movements from any angle and enhance your skills with a dynamic ball machine. Get analytics for every exercise and save them in your user profile. Focus on mastering key techniques like forehand and backhand blocks, pushes, flicks, and counters. 

** Multiplayer matches **
Are you into multiplayer matches and competition? Challenge your friends or compete with players worldwide.
